xwikidoc.name: Translations

xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Workspace Manager translation page
# MESSAGES workspacemanager.pluginnotenabled=The Workspace Manager java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the file 'wiki30-components-workspace-manager-<version>.jar' is present under the 'webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib/' folder. workspacemanager.template.install.success=Workspace template has been successfully installed. workspacemanager.template.install.error=Error installing workspace template. {0} workspacemanager.template.install.error.missingattachment=Error installing the workspace template. The file "{0}" is not attached to the document [[{1}>>{1}]]. Please re-import the [[{1}>>{1}]] document from the Workspaces Application XAR. workspacemanager.template.install.error.missingtemplateattachment=Error installing the workspace template. The file "{0}" is not attached to the document [[{1}>>{1}]]. Please attach a base template that will be used for all newly created workspaces. You can download one from [[here>>{2}]] and rename it to "{0}" before attaching it. workspacemanager.template.install.notYetComplete=The installation process is not yet complete.\n\ \n\ In order to finish the installation process, please log in as Admin and go to the page [[{0}>>{0}]]. workspacemanager.translations.install.success=Workspace translations have been successfully installed. platform.workspace.translationsInstallSaveComment=Automatically registered Workspace translations. workspacemanager.searchSuggestions.install.success=Workspace search suggestions have been successfully installed. platform.workspace.searchSuggestionsInstallSaveComment=Automatically registered workspace search suggestions. workspacemanager.install.notallowed=Admin rights are required to complete the Workspace Manager installation. Please login as Admin to complete the installation. workspacemanager.dependencies.wikimanager.missing=The [[Wiki Manager Plugin>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Wiki+Manager+Plugin]] is not installed. Please install it and try again. workspacemanager.dependencies.applicationmanager.missing=The [[Application Manager Plugin>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Application+Manager+Plugin]] is not installed. Please install it and try again. workspacemanager.wikiprettyname.error.empty=Pretty name must not be empty workspacemanager.successcreatewiki=Your workspace \"{0}\" has been created. You can access it at the following address: {1} workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki=Workspace \"{0}\" creation failed: {1}. workspacemanager.errorcreatewiki.ERROR_WM_WIKIALREADYEXISTS=This workspace \"{0}\" already exist. Please choose another name. workspacemanager.install.translations=The translations page has been automatically registered in XWiki's preferences. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Workspace [{0}] does not exist workspacemanager.wikiname.error.databasealreadyexists=A database with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.wikialreadyexists=A wiki with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.workspacealreadyexists=A workspace with this identifier already exists workspacemanager.wikiname.error.empty=Identifier can't be empty workspacemanager.wikiname.error.alreadyused=This identifier is already used workspacemanager.error.notinvirtualmode=The current XWiki installation is not in virtual mode. This means you can only access the main wiki. Make sure you have <tt>xwiki.virtual=1</tt> in the <tt>xwiki.cfg</tt> file. platform.workspace.templateNotInstalledInstallNow=Workspace template is not yet installed. Install the workspace template now? platform.workspace.templateMigrateSuccess=The existing default workspace template has been successfully migrated to the new format. platform.workspace.templateInstallConfirm=Install platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallErrorNeedTemplateFirst=Workspace template features can not be installed without the workspace base template being installed first. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallTranslationsAndPanelSaveComment=Automatically registered workspace translations and panel platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallRemoveAdminSaveComment=Automatically removed local admin. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetViewRightsSaveComment=Automatically set default rights for global users to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetPanelViewRightsGuestsSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to panels for guests to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetPanelViewRightsGlobalUsersSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to panels for global users to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetThemesViewRightsGuestsSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to color themes for guests to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetThemesViewRightsGlobalUsersSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to color themes for global users to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetSkinViewRightsGuestsSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to skin for guests to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSetSkinViewRightsGlobalUsersSaveComment=Automatically set default rights to skin for global users to allow view. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallFixMacrosSaveComment=Fixed macro registration. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallFixConfigurableClassSaveComment=Fixed Configurable Class registration issues. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallFixSSXSaveComment=Fixed SSX registration issues. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallFixJSXSaveComment=Fixed JSX registration issues. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallFixRequiredRightClassSaveComment=Fixed RequiredRightClass requests. platform.workspace.templateFeaturesInstallSuccess=Workspace template features successfully installed. platform.workspace.oneParameterNotSpecified=The ''{0}'' parameter was not specified. platform.workspace.twoParametersNotSpecified=The ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' parameters were not specified. platform.workspace.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Multiple values accepted. platform.workspace.exceptionWithMessage=Exception: {0} platform.workspace.userAlreadyMemberOfWorkspace=The user [[{0}]] is already a member of the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.userNotMemberOfWorkspace=The user [[{0}]] is not a member of the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.logInToContinue=In order to continue, you need to [[log in>>{0}]] first. platform.workspace.invitationUserAcceptedSaveComment=The user {0} accepted the invitation. platform.workspace.invitationUserAcceptedNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has accepted the invitation to join the workspace ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.workspace.invitationUserAcceptedSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully accepted the invitation and joined the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.invitationUserRejectedSaveComment=The user {0} rejected the invitation. platform.workspace.invitationUserRejectedNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has rejected the invitation to join the workspace ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.workspace.invitationUserRejectedSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully rejected the invitation to join the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.joinErrorNeedInvitation=This workspace is invite only. In order to join it, you need to receive an invitation from one of its admins. platform.workspace.joinRequestPendingRequestExists=The user [[{0}]] already has a pending request to join the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. Please wait for a workspace admin to review it. platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelConfirmation=Are you sure you want cancel the request to join the workspace [[{0}>>{1}]]? platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelYes=Yes platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelNo=No platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelSaveCommit=The user {0} cancelled his join request. platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully cancelled the request to join the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.joinRequestSaveComment=The user {0} requested to join the workspace. platform.workspace.joinRequestSaveNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has requested to join the workspace ''{2}'' ({3}). platform.workspace.joinRequestSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully sent the request to join workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.joinConfirmation=Are you sure you want to join the workspace [[{0}>>{1}]]? platform.workspace.joinYes=Yes platform.workspace.joinNo=No platform.workspace.joinSaveComment=The user {0} joined the workspace. platform.workspace.joinSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully joined workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. platform.workspace.macroNoWorkspaces=There are currently no workspaces created. platform.workspace.createInitialMembersSaveComment=Added initial workspace members platform.workspace.profileNotMemberOfAnyWorkspace=You are not a member of any workspace yet. platform.workspace.profileUserNotMemberOfAnyWorkspace=The user is not a member of any workspace yet. platform.workspace.deleteWorkspaceConfirmation=Are you sure you want to delete the workspace [[{0}>>{1}]]? platform.workspace.deleteWorkspaceYes=Yes platform.workspace.deleteWorkspaceNo=No platform.workspace.deleteWorkspaceSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully deleted the workspace ''{1}''. platform.workspace.leaveErrorUserIsOwner=The user [[{0}]] is the owner of the workspace [[{1}>>{2}]]. The owner of a workspace may not leave it unless the workspace is deleted or the owner is changed. platform.workspace.leaveConfirmation=Are you sure you want to leave workspace [[{0}>>{1}]]? platform.workspace.leaveYes=Yes platform.workspace.leaveNo=No platform.workspace.leaveSaveComment=User {0} left workspace. platform.workspace.leaveSuccess=The user [[{0}]] successfully left workspace [[{1}>>{2}]].

workspacemanager.menu.user.workspaces=Workspaces workspacemanager.profile.category.workspaces=Workspaces platform.workspace.templateWikiTitle=Workspace Template platform.workspace.invitationViewTitle=You have been invited to join the workspace [[{0}>>{1}]]. platform.workspace.invitationMessageLabel=Invitation message platform.workspace.invitationReplyLabel=Reply platform.workspace.invitationAcceptLabel=Accept platform.workspace.invitationRejectLabel=Reject platform.workspace.invitationPostponeLabel=Later platform.workspace.joinRequestMessageLabel=Message platform.workspace.joinRequestSendLabel=Send Request platform.workspace.joinRequestCancelLabel=Back platform.workspace.searchSuggestExampleLabel=Examples: platform.workspace.activityTitle=Activity of workspace {0} platform.workspace.activityMultipleTitle=Activity of workspaces {0} # Macro translation keys need to respect the convention rendering.macro.workspaces.name=Workspaces platform.workspace.createNewWorkspaceLabel=Create a new Workspace platform.workspace.requiredField=Required platform.workspace.profileJoinedWorkspacesLabel=Joined workspaces platform.workspace.profileShowActivity=show activity platform.workspace.newWorkspaceTemplateLabel=Template WorkspaceManager.WorkspaceClass_membershipType_open=Open for any user to join WorkspaceManager.WorkspaceClass_membershipType_request=Any user can request to join but an admin must accept # PROPERTIES workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiname=Workspace Identifier workspacemanager.prop.wiki.wikiprettyname=Pretty Name workspacemanager.prop.wiki.description=Description workspacemanager.prop.wiki.server=Alias workspacemanager.prop.wiki.owner=Owner workspacemanager.prop.workspace.membershipType.label=Membership Type
# DOCUMENTATION workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.wikiname=The unique identifier of the new workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the workspace. platform.workspace.newWorkspaceTemplateHint=Template to use for this new workspace (all documents will be cloned). workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.description=A brief description of the workspace and its purpose. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on the workspace. workspacemanager.doc.createwiki.members=The users that can participate in the workspace. workspacemanager.prop.workspace.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this workspace. platform.workspace.invitationReplyHint=A reply message to send, viewable by the workspace admin, in which you can motivate your decision. platform.workspace.joinRequestHint=To join the workspace [[{0}>>{1}]], you must first issue a join request. After this, a workspace admin will review your request and consider accepting or rejecting it. platform.workspace.joinRequestMessageHint=A message to send, viewable by the workspace admin, in which you can motivate this join request. platform.workspace.searchSuggestHint=This service allows to retrieve search results for the suggest UI component. platform.workspace.activityHint=Generates an activity stream for the given workspace(s). rendering.macro.workspaces.description=List all workspaces
## Group sheet. To be removed once it gets into platform. xe.admin.groups.comment=About xe.admin.groups.tags=Tags xe.admin.groups._actions.follow=Follow xe.admin.groups._actions.unfollow=Unfollow
